skinType.title: Skin Variation
skinType.tooltip: The variation of skin texture to use for your unsuited model.

jetpackType.title: Jetpack Variation
jetpackType.tooltip: The variation of texture to use for the bedroll on your suited model.

useKcpTransport.title: Use KCP Transport
useKcpTransport.tooltip: Use alternative transport that requires port forwarding but seems to be more reliable. Use this if you are having trouble connecting. ALL PLAYERS MUST HAVE THIS AS THE SAME VALUE.

kcpPort.title: KCP Transport Port
kcpPort.tooltip: The port to use for the KCP transport, if it is enabled. Must be port forwarded as TCP/UDP. ALL PLAYERS MUST HAVE THIS AS THE SAME VALUE.

defaultServerIP.title: Last Entered IP/ID
defaultServerIP.tooltip: Used if you leave the connect prompt blank.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.tooltip: How many seconds it takes for a connection to time out.

showPlayerNames.title: Show Player Names
showPlayerNames.tooltip: Shows player names in the HUD and the map view.

shipDamage.title: Ship Damage
shipDamage.tooltip: Take impact damage when inside the ship.

showExtraHud.title: Show Extra HUD Elements
showExtraHud.tooltip: Show extra HUD elements, like player status and minimap icons.

alwaysShowPlanetIcons.title: Always Show Planet Icons
alwaysShowPlanetIcons.tooltip: If disabled, the planet icon shown for each player will be replaced by a question mark (?) in thematically appropriate situations.

textChatInput.title: Text Chat Input
textChatInput.tooltip: Disable this if using NomaiVR, or any other mod with conflicting inputs.

debugMode.title: [DEBUG] Debug Mode
debugMode.tooltip: [DEBUG] Enables debug mode. If this is disabled, none of the following settings do anything.

instanceIdInLogs.title: [DEBUG] Instance ID in Logs
instanceIdInLogs.tooltip: [DEBUG] Appends the game instance id to every log message sent. Only takes effect after a game restart.

hookDebugLogs.title: [DEBUG] Hook Debug Logs
hookDebugLogs.tooltip: [DEBUG] Prints every Unity warning + error to the logs. Only takes effect after a game restart.

avoidTimeSync.title: [DEBUG] Disable Time Sync
avoidTimeSync.tooltip: [DEBUG] If enabled, you will no longer fast forward / pause to match the server time. THIS CAN BREAK A LOT OF STUFF!

autoStart.title: [DEBUG] Auto Start
autoStart.tooltip: [DEBUG] Automatically host and connect depending on the game instance id for faster testing.

drawGui.title: [DEBUG] Draw GUI
drawGui.tooltip: [DEBUG] Draws a lot of helpful text at the top of the screen.

drawLines.title: [DEBUG] Draw Lines
drawLines.tooltip: [DEBUG] Draws a lot of helpful lines between stuff. LAGGY!

drawLabels.title: [DEBUG] Draw Labels
drawLabels.tooltip: [DEBUG] Draws a lot of helpful labels on stuff. LAGGY!

latencySimulation.title: [DEBUG] Latency Simulation
latencySimulation.tooltip: [DEBUG] How many seconds of latency to simulate.

logQSBMessages.title: [DEBUG] Log QSB Messages
logQSBMessages.tooltip: [DEBUG] If enabled, QSB creates log files of every network message received and transmitted.
